stockfile.controllers

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • stockfile.controllers.LoginController

  • public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    Login Controller contains the methods required to authenticate a user, create a new user, and create a new client.
    Author:
    Jeremy Wallace, Bahman Razmpa, Peter Lee

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createClient(java.util.Scanner scanner)
      Creates a client and adds it to the client table along with a link that relates to the user to user_client table
      static LoginController getInstance()
      Static method returns a single instance of Login Controller
      static java.lang.String getMacAddr() 
      void run()
      Displays the welcome screen - 1: prompts the user for login credentials - 2: prompts the user for basic information
